mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_TEL, MEMBER_NICKNAME, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_GENDER, NAVER_FL FROM "TB_MEMBER" WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "TB_MEMBER" WHERE MEMBER_DEL_FL = 'N' AND MEMBER_EMAIL = #{memberEmail}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "TB_MEMBER" WHERE MEMBER_DEL_FL = 'N' AND MEMBER_NICKNAME = #{memberNickname}
SELECT MEMBER_NO, RECEIVERNAME, POSTCODE, ADDRESS, DETAILADDRESS, PHONE, EXTRAPHONE, BASIC_ADDRESS FROM "TB_ADDRESS" WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} ORDER BY BASIC_ADDRESS DESC, ADDRESS_NO DESC
